name: LaserDefender (Katiecat22)
description:
An arcade space shooter mostly made following a course from gamedev.tv, with several additions, including a variety of enemy types, powerups, and asteroids.

Note: Highscores will not save between play sessions.

Controls:

WASD or arrows to move

K or Left click to shoot

L, Space, or Right click to dash

Music from opengameart.org

background from gamedev.tv
